name: openapi-clients
description: OpenAPI Clients for Holy Bible API

scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-typescript && npm run generate-python && npm run generate-rust
scripts.generate-rust: rm -rf ./rust/package/src/generated && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./openapi.json -g rust -o ./rust/package/src/generated --skip-validate-spec && rm rust/package/src/generated/Cargo.toml
scripts.update-all-clients: npm run get-latest-openapi && npm run generate-all
